Restricted  
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:  29/06/2012 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  12 /2012 
 
 
Subject: Facility of Access to tarmac on his own vehicle by His Holiness  
                Jagadguru Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati of  
               Dwarka/Sharda Peeth at airports on Medical Grounds. 
 
 
                In continuation to this Bureau Circular No.1/2012 dated 04/01/2012, His Holiness 
Shri Jagat Guru Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati  of Dwarka/Sharda peeth 
alongwith his ADC (Shri G.R.Mishra) or a private security is permitted to avail the access of 
his vehicle up to the tarmac, on medical ground, during his departure/arrival by air at all 
airports in the country for a period of one year  w.e.f 28.06.2012.  
 
 
( R.N.Dhoke, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached / overleaf. 
 
Copy to :- 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri Ashok Kumar, Under Secretary), Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan,  
             
New Delhi      : w.r.t  MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated  
                                      22/06/2012 ( Fax No: 24619226)

                 (Gujrat)
